TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDocumentStructureProvider

summary.span: Définit une méthode pour ajouter la partie de XPS à un package XPS.

span.span: Defines a method for adding the part of XML Paper Specification (XPS) to an XPS package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plus d’informations sur la `DocumentStructure` élément d’une [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] de package, consultez le chapitre 9 dans le [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] spécification, que vous pouvez obtenir à [XPS : Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Windows.Xps.Packaging.XpsStructure AddDocumentStructure() cil managed

summary.span: Ajoute la partie de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] à un package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].

span.span: Adds the part of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] to an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

returns.span: Une qui représente la partie d'un package [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)].

span.span: An that represents the part of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Pour plus d’informations sur le `DocumentStructure` élément d’une [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] de package, consultez le chapitre 9 de la [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] spécification, que vous pouvez obtenir à [XPS : Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).For more information about the `DocumentStructure` element of an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)] package, see chapter 9 of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xps](~/includes/tlasharptla-xps-md.md)] specification, which you can obtain at [XPS: Specification and License Downloads](http://www.microsoft.com/whdc/xps/downloads.mspx).
